script.title: op-ether-table.slax
script.author: phil.shafer
script.synopsis: Show ethernet statistics in a table format
script.description:
This script gets "FE" statistics from the PFE and displays the chip counters for packet histogram data in a table. The chips records transmit and receive sizes for the following buckets: 0-64 65-127 128-255 256-511 512-1023 1024-1518
This script was developed as a demo for a presentation at the J-Tech Forum in 2007.
